staxel.village.dialogue.job.PetStoreMiss: (안함)Sadly, the ^c:1486b0;patisserie^c:pop; is currently closed for renovations.
(안함)If only someone could finish the job I'd reopen...
(안함)Why did someone vandalise the ^c:1486b0;patisserie^c:pop;?
(안함)I can already feel my icing skills begin to rust...
(안함)If this keeps up I'll end up icing the town instead!
(안함)A town with out a ^c:1486b0;patisserie^c:pop; is like a cake without icing.
(안함){0-playername}, won't you consider building me a ^c:1486b0;patisserie^c:pop;?
(안함)I can give you this ^c:d03e37;signpost^c:pop; to get you started.
(안함)Place it at the front of the building for me!
(안함)That way everyone will know where to find us once it's built!
(안함)Oh, how I'd love to be able to bake again...
(안함)It sounds like the ^c:d03e37;patisserie signpost^c:pop; has gone missing...
(안함)I can get you another, but it's going to cost you {0-currency}{1-sign}. How's that?
(안함)You're a lifesaver!
(안함)I think I know where it is...
(안함)Oh, that's good to hear!
(안함)I hope to see a wonderful patisserie soon!
(안함)Oh dear... It looks like you don't have enough petals...
(안함)Don't worry! I'll hold on to it until you can afford it!
(안함)Okay! Here it is!
